content.rendered:
Directed by Ayumu Watanabe. Jun’ichi Yamamoto

Written by Hiroshi Seko. Yasuki Tanaka

Cast Natsuki Hanae( Shinpei Ajiro18 episodes, 2022 ). Anna Nagase( Ushio Kofune18 episodes, 2022 ). Shirasu Saho( Mio Kofune16 episodes, 2022 ). Kenshô Ono( So Hishigata16 episodes, 2022 ). Yôko Hikasa( Hizuru Minakata15 episodes, 2022 ). Maki Kawase( Tokiko Hishigata14 episodes, 2022 ). Jin Urayama( Ginjiro Nezu13 episodes, 2022 ). Yôji Ueda( Tetsu Totsumura12 episodes, 2022 ). Rie Kugimiya( Shiori Kobayakawa9 episodes, 2022 ). Akio Ôtsuka( Seido Hishigata8 episodes, 2022 ). Katsuyuki Konishi( Masahito Karikiri / …7 episodes, 2022 ). Misaki Kuno( Haine7 episodes, 2022 ). Tesshô Genda( Alain Kofune6 episodes, 2022 ). Sakiko Kawai( Negoro / …5 episodes, 2022 ). Ai Yamamoto( Asako Kobayakawa5 episodes, 2022 ). Yoshihisa Hosokawa( Tatsuo Kobayakawa4 episodes, 2022 ). Rika Hayashi( Akari / …4 episodes, 2022 ). Mana Nakatomi( Hamaji3 episodes, 2022 ). Yûko Sanpei( Ryunosuke Minakata2 episodes, 2022 ). Takehiro Hasu( Nakamura2 episodes, 2022 ). Marie Ôi( Machiko2 episodes, 2022 ). Arisa Sakuraba( Chitose Hishigata2 episodes, 2022 ). Serika Hiromatsu( Lighthouse / …2 episodes, 2022 ). Yasushi Iwaki( Miura1 episode, 2022 ). Ryosuke Hara( Takoyaki Shop Owner1 episode, 2022 ). Sachiko Honma( Shiomi1 episode, 2022 ). Shukuko Tsugawa( Etsuko1 episode, 2022 ). Ellen Taira( Announcement1 episode, 2022 ). Sakiko Tanaka(1 episode, 2022 ). Shohei Tabuchi( Shadow1 episode, 2022 ). Toshiki Watanabe( Toru Ajiro1 episode, 2022 ). Yui Shoji( Shadow Mother1 episode, 2022 ). Mai Satou( Shadow Child1 episode, 2022 )

Language Japanese

Production Oriental Light and Magic (OLM). Weekly Shonen Jump.

Season 1

Total Episodes 25
